title: RM65-01 Grey NTPT
description: The Richard Mille RM65-01 Grey NTPT is crafted in a 44.50 x 50mm tonneau-shaped case, constructed from grey Quartz TPT, with the inner core made from Carbon TPT.It features a skeletonized dial with luminescent hour and minute hands, a date window at 11 o’clock, and multiple sub-dials, including a 30-minute counter at 3 o’clock and a 12-hour counter at 9 o’clock.The automatic movement is powered by the RMAC4 calibre, offering approximately 60 hours of power reserve. The watch is secured to the wrist by a rubber strap with a folding clasp and is water-resistant up to 50 meters.New (100%) conditions. New and unworn. The item has the original manufacturer’s protective plastic (if applicable). Comes with box and papers.

title: RM037 TPT Gold
description: Experience the epitome of luxury timekeeping with the Richard Mille RM037 TPT Gold. This exceptional piece embodies the pinnacle of high horology, combining world-class craftsmanship with stunning aesthetics.The case and bezel are crafted from Gold Carbon TPT, a unique blend of Carbon TPT and gold that ensures both strength and lightness. The dial is adorned with black sapphires, their centers echoing the deep allure of Onyx. Functionality is expertly interwoven with elegance, as the pusher between 4 and 5 o'clock grants easy access to setting functions, while another between 10 and 11 o'clock sets the big date.Powered by the reliable Caliber CRMA1, this watch boasts an impressive 50 hours power reserve. Water-resistant up to 50 meters and strapped onto a sleek black rubber bracelet, the Richard Mille RM037 TPT Gold redefines reliability without compromising on style.Unworn (99%) conditions. New without sign of wear. The item comes with original box and papers but the warranty date / stamp is older. May have handling marks. Comes with box and papers.

title: Nautilus 5712/1R-001 Brown
description: The Patek Philippe Nautilus 5712/1R-001 is crafted in a 40 mm case size in rose gold with a polished and satin-finished octagonal bezel.It features a brown sunburst dial with a black gradient rim, horizontally embossed, and gold applied hour markers with luminescent coating. The dial also includes an analog date by hand, moon phases, power reserve indicator, and small seconds.The self-winding mechanical movement is powered by the Caliber 240 PS IRM C LU, with 48 hours of power reserve. The watch is secured to the wrist by a rose gold bracelet with a patented fold-over clasp and lockable adjustment system. Water-resistant up to 30 meters.Unworn (99%) conditions. New without sign of wear. The item comes with original box and papers but the warranty date / stamp is older. May have handling marks. Comes with box and papers.

title: RM65-01 RG/CA
description: The Richard Mille RM65-01 RG/CA Split Seconds Chronograph is crafted in a 44.50 x 50mm tonneau-shaped case size, constructed from rose gold with the inner core manufactured in carbon TPT.The skeletonized dial features split-seconds chronograph that includes a seconds counter at 6 o'clock, a 12-hour counter at 9 o'clock, a 30-minute counter at 3 o'clock, a date window at 11 o'clock, and a function selector at 5 o'clock, which allows the user to seamlessly switch between 3 modes: ‘W’ for traditional winding, ‘D’ for date adjustment, and ‘H’ for time-setting.The automatic movement is powered by the Calibre RMAC4 with 60- hours of power reserve and includes an in-house rapid winding mechanism that allows the barrel to be quickly rearmed in the event the watch stops. Secured to the wrist with a black rubber strap and rose gold fold-over clasp. Water-resistant up to 50 meters.Good (80%) conditions. Some signs of wear or scratches, but the product is in good condition overall. Glass, hands, dial, case, and movement in good condition. May have small dents. May have been polished. Comes with box and papers.

title: RM52-06 White Mask
description: The Richard Mille RM 52-06 White Mask is crafted in a 42.7 mm tonneau-shaped case in white Quartz TPT with a signature Richard Mille tripartite construction and curved bezel profile.It features a fully skeletonized dial highlighted by an iconic mask motif in PVD-treated Grade 5 titanium, integrated directly into the movement architecture. The dial is fitted with skeletonized hour and minute hands, peripheral minute track, and a prominent flying tourbillon at 6 o’clock.The manual-winding mechanical movement is powered by the Calibre RM 52-06, offering 42 hours of power reserve. The watch is secured to the wrist by a white rubber strap with a double folding titanium clasp. Water-resistant up to 50 meters.Good (80%) conditions. Some signs of wear or scratches, but the product is in good condition overall. Glass, hands, dial, case, and movement in good condition. May have small dents. May have been polished. Comes with box and papers.

title: Opera Godfather OP500.40.AA.AA.ABALA

title: RM50-03 McLaren Tourbillon
description: The Richard Mille RM 50-03 McLaren Tourbillon is crafted in a 44.5 mm tonneau-shaped case constructed from Carbon TPT reinforced with Graph TPT (graphene), combined with grade 5 titanium elements and a signature spline-screw construction.It features a skeletonized dial revealing the complex movement architecture, accented by applied hour markers, skeletonized titanium hour and minute hands with luminous inserts, a split-seconds chronograph seconds hand, a 30-minute totaliser, and a prominent tourbillon cage at 6 o’clock. Performance indicators for power reserve, torque, and function selection further emphasize its Formula 1–inspired.The manual-winding mechanical movement is powered by the Calibre RM50-03, offering 70 hours of power reserve. title: Horological Machine 6 HM6 Space Pirate Rose Gold Limited 60RLB
description: The MB&F HM6 Space Pirate Rose Gold Limited 60RLB features a 49.5mm × 52.3mm case crafted from rose gold and titanium, highlighted by a retractable hood operated on the side crown. Produced in an ultra-limited run of only 18 pieces, this Horological Machine is a bold and exceptionally rare creation from MB&F.Its biomorphic case features four sapphire domes set over a black titanium dial. The two lower domes display rotating aluminum semi-spheres for the hours and minutes, while the two upper domes showcase spinning turbines that regulate winding efficiency. At the center, a large domed sapphire crystal reveals a flying tourbillon, protected by a mechanical shield that opens and closes like an eye, designed to guard the mechanism from UV light when closed.The manual-winding movement is powered by a platinum “battle-axe” rotor with its rotation controlled by the twin turbines, offering a power reserve of 72 hours. The watch is secured to the wrist by a dark brown leather strap with a deployant clasp. Water-resistant up to 30 meters.Mint / Like New (95-99%) conditions. As good as New. It is a Used item that has been used several times and is in a very good condition that is close to a brand new item. Few scratches due to wear. Comes with box only.

The dial includes functional indicators for the winding system (on/off) and a mode selector for time-setting, neutral, and winding positions.The automatic movement is powered by the RMAL2 Calibre, with a 55-hour power reserve supported by a double-barrel system. The watch is secured to the wrist by a black rubber strap with a titanium folding clasp. Water-resistant up to 50 meters.New (100%) conditions. New and unworn. Powered by RMAR1 Caliber that has skeletonized automatic movement with date functionality at 7 o'clock, a winding indicator and adjustable rotor geometry. title: Grand Complications 5270P-001 Salmon
description: The Patek Philippe Grand Complications Perpetual Calendar Chronograph 5270P-001 is crafted in a 41 mm platinum case with a smooth polished bezel.It features a salmon opaline dial with blackened gold leaf-shaped hands, Arabic numerals, and a day and month aperture at 12 o’clock. The dial also includes three sub-dials for the chronograph and calendar functions, along with a moonphase display and date indicator at 6 o’clock.The manual-winding movement is powered by the Calibre CH 29-535 PS Q, offering a 55–65 hour power reserve. The watch is secured with a brown alligator leather strap fitted with a fold-over clasp. Water-resistant up to 30 meters.Excellent (90%) conditions. Close to like new conditions. Light signs of wear or scratches. Glass, hands, dial, case, and movement in very good condition. No deep scratches. May have been polished. Comes with box and papers.
